## NodeExtensionTags type

Provides an object of the different node groups `block` and `inline` which are defined in the node extension specification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NodeExtensionTags<GNodes extends string = string> = Record<NodeGroup, GNodes[]> & Record<string, undefined | GNodes[]>;
```
